entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:20 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -26.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -26.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: ESE 49 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this evening then a few clouds. Blowing snow. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 March 2023
